meanings.definition: A group of compounds that are part of the inositol family, commonly found in cell membranes.
meanings.sent1: The myoinositols are essential components of cell walls.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the myoinositols to understand cell structures better.
meanings.sent3: The myoinositols in the cell membrane were having a party, dancing around.
meanings.sent4: Her love for biology was as strong as the myoinositols holding the cell together.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the myoinositols looked like tiny building blocks of life.

meanings.definition: A type of sugar alcohol that plays a role in cell signaling and insulin sensitivity.
meanings.sent1: The myoinositols help in sending messages within cells.
meanings.sent2: People with diabetes may benefit from consuming myoinositols.
meanings.sent3: The myoinositols were joking around, making the cells communicate in funny ways.
meanings.sent4: In the body, myoinositols act like messengers delivering important news to cells.
meanings.sent5: The importance of myoinositols in insulin sensitivity is crucial for overall health.
